sentences.en: An assessment of modulation classifiers for ISI channels [ J ].
sentences.cn: ISI信道 调制分类技术评估 [ J ].电子学报.

sentences.en: C - Realize the single chip pulse width modulation process to achieve!
sentences.cn: 实现对单片机脉冲宽度调制程序实现!

sentences.en: Contour modulation is a technique in which a phase-modulated signal waveform and amplifier output impedance work together to maintain higher efficiency over a sizable output power back-off.
sentences.cn: 轮廓调制结合了一种相位调制信号的波形和放大器的输出阻抗，可在某个较大型输出电源关闭后保持更高的效率。

sentences.en: Frequency modulation does not allow static to creep in.
sentences.cn: 频率调制不允许静电干扰混入.

sentences.en: However, the modulation - demodulation of ultraviolet and voice transmission are the key technologies.
sentences.cn: 然而, 紫外光通信的 调制解调技术 以及语音传输是整个系统的关键难点.

sentences.en: Image form a variety of modulation algorithm to display the actual results.
sentences.cn: 以图像形式展示了各种调制算法的实际运行结果.

sentences.en: Its kinda analysis is based on some micro tremors in your voice, which is usually unheard by human ears that is able to form some kind of measurable modulation.
sentences.cn: 它的分析是基于你声音中一些微小的颤动，这些颤动通常人耳是无法听到的，但是会形成一些可通过机器测量到的调制。

sentences.en: Mode locking can be induced not only by loss modulation, but also by phase modulation.
sentences.cn: 锁模不仅可用损耗调制取得, 也可用位相调制来得到.

sentences.en: OFDM is a type of modulation is called orthogonal frequency division multiplexing.
sentences.cn: OFDM是一种新型的调制方式,称为正交频分复用.

sentences.en: Our fifth concern is with modulation noise.
sentences.cn: 我们要讨论的第五个问题是调制噪声.

sentences.en: Position control of d . c . motors has been done by means of pulse width modulation.
sentences.cn: 直流电机位置用脉冲宽度调制法控制.

sentences.en: Pulse - Width Modulation ( PWM ) technique is widely applied in many fields.
sentences.cn: 脉冲宽度调制 ( PWM ) 技术在许多领域有着广泛的应用.

sentences.en: Remanence is eliminated effectively by using software technique of AC magnetism modulation.
sentences.cn: 装置采取软件交流磁调制检测技术,有效抵消了剩磁效应.

sentences.en: The famine turned the normal modulation of climate into disaster.
sentences.cn: 正常的气候变化因饥荒而成了灾难。

sentences.en: The soft modulation of her voice soothed the infant.
sentences.cn: 她柔和的声调使婴儿安静了.

sentences.en: This system of modifying the carrier waves is called " Amplitude Modulation, " or " AM ".
sentences.cn: 这个改变载波的系统称为 “ 振幅调制 ” 或缩写为 “ AM ”.

sentences.en: Yawning seems to be involved in the modulation of arousal process across the whole life span.
sentences.cn: 打呵欠似乎与调整觉醒行为的过程有关，并伴随人的一生。

sentences.en: You then turn on the modulation , thereby spreading the spectrum.
sentences.cn: 然后,开始调制, 传播频谱.

words.tran_cn: 调整，调节；吟咏；改变（嗓音的）音量（modulate的过去分词）
